summary: Two employees of the Icelandic Road Administration spend the summer painting lines on the winding roads as they both find themselves at a crossroads in their lives.
cast: Hilmar Guðjónsson|Sveinn Ólafur Gunnarsson|Þorsteinn Bachmann|Valgerður Rúnarsdóttir|Þorbjörn Guðmundsson|Runólfur Ingólfsson
title: Á annan veg
